name: tech-recruit-commands
description: Scripts de utilidade para o projeto Tech Recruit

scripts.setup: npm install && cd front-end && npm install && cd ../back-end && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd back-end && npm run dev" "cd front-end && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd back-end && npm start" "cd front-end && npx serve dist -l 3000"
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
